text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
We're halfway through the<n>academy's summer camp, and<n>
Nature has already gotten a lot better<n>at running on the
beach.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Phew... Well? Has my time improved<n>or what?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her results speak volumes to how<n>much work she's been
putting in<n>these past few days.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I can run pretty well on sand now, but<n>I wonder if that'll
transfer to the track.
choice_data_list: You've got first place in the bag!
You've got first place in the bag!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Nah, no way it's gonna be that easy.<n>For one thing,
everyone's training<n>just as hard as we are.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh, but I probably shouldn't be saying<n>that in front of the
trainer who's been<n>helping me train from dawn to dusk<n>
every day.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Haha, let's just chalk it up to a<n>defect in my personality. Old
habits die<n>hard.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: We keep going back and forth like<n>this for a while...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
I didn't know there was gonna be a<n>festival—I should've
brought my<n>yukata.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Hey now, you can have fun at a<n>festival no matter what
you're<n>wearing.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh, so there's a festival going on<n>today.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Oh, good idea.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I've got a soft spot for festivals.<n>Especially the smaller
ones—like at the<n>local park.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I used to go with my friends, and<n>we'd get up to all kinds of
hijinks.<n>Man, good times, good times.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I may not look it, but they used to call<n>me the dancing queen!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Well, not like anyone cares though.<n>But hey, having festival
dancing as<n>one of my only talents is pretty<n>on-brand,
don'tcha think?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Anyways, that's enough about the<n>past. Let's go see that
festival!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Man, nothing beats a summer<n>festival.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Now, where to first? There's noodles,<n>grilled corn... Oh,
grilled squid sounds<n>good too!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, I've been training my butt off,<n>so I think I deserve a
little treat!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, you gotta let loose a bit more.<n>I can't be the only
one getting all<n>excited.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Nature and I spend some time<n>walking around the festival...

text_block_list.name: Festival Organizer
text_block_list.text: You can register for the Festival<n>Dance Grand Prix here!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: The Festival Dance Grand Prix?
choice_data_list: It'd be nice to see you in action.
It'd be nice to see you in action.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh?! No no no no, wait just a<n>second now.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I said my friends thought I was good<n>at dancing, not that I
was competition<n>material.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
If I'm gonna dance, I'd rather it be in<n>a small park with
people I know.
choice_data_list: Are you calling your friends liars?
Are you calling your friends liars?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Th-that's not the issue here...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Man, you really do lay it on thick<n>when it comes to coaxing
me into<n>doing something.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Rather than dancing, let's go check<n>out some more stalls! I
haven't tried<n>the butter potatoes yet! C'mon, chop<n>chop!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I go after Nature, who's already<n>dashed off to the food
stalls, leaving<n>the dancing crowd behind.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Whew... I'm stuffed. Might've gotten<n>ahead of myself on
those skewers.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
All right, I've done what I came here<n>for, so wanna head
back? We've still<n>got training tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Just as we're about to leave the<n>festival and go back to the
dorm...

text_block_list.name: Festival Organizer
text_block_list.text: Last call to sign up for the Festival<n>Dance Grand Prix!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...H-hey.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You really want to see? My... um,<n>dancing...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
My friends said I was good, but it's<n>really just your
everyday festival<n>dancing...
choice_data_list: I want to see you dance!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Haha... I see. Then I'll enter.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But don't get your hopes up too high,<n>okay? It's been a
minute since I've<n>done any sort of dancing.
choice_data_list:
If you're entering, you might as well aim for the
gold!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Were you even listening to what I<n>just said?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, Nature signs herself up for<n>the Festival Dance
Grand Prix.

text_block_list.name: Festival Organizer
text_block_list.text: This year's Festival Dance Grand<n>Prix winner is...

text_block_list.name: Festival Organizer
text_block_list.text:
Number 12! Hailing from Tracen<n>Academy, it's the
Umamusume—Nice<n>Natty!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: It's Nice Nature. Wait, no way?M-me?!

text_block_list.name: Festival Organizer
text_block_list.text:
Your enthusiastic performance went<n>straight after our
hearts. All the<n>judges picked you unanimously.<n>
Congratulations!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Th-thank you very much...

text_block_list.name: Festival Organizer
text_block_list.text: Let's have a round of applause for<n>our winner—Nice Natty!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Clap clap clap!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Like I said, it's not Natty—Ah, thank<n>you, thank you.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Wow... didn't think I'd win the whole<n>thing.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, thanks. I'm still not sure what<n>got into me, signing up
for a contest<n>like that.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Who knows... maybe your bottomless<n>optimism has started
rubbing off on<n>me.
choice_data_list:
Maybe you're just starting to believe in yourself
a bit more?

Maybe you're just starting to believe in yourself
a bit more?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Yeah yeah, don't worry—I'm still the<n>same wet blanket.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
All right, tomorrow it's back to<n>training! Maybe I'll be the
winner in<n>my next race, too. One can always<n>dream, right?
